item.title: D - The track panel of a video editor
item.description: In the previous post, we have learned how to design a video player. In fact, a video player is a container containing many tracks, such as bgm, text, and so on. Can we show and edit these tracks? Of course we can. But today, we will focus on the UI part. For the edit operation, we will talk it later.

item.title: D - Things about frames
item.description: Speaking of images and videos, we often use img/video to preview them. However, there are more ways to do this. Today we will introduce some new preview techniques based on frames, such as frame-based video preview, drawing continuous frames over a time, and extract any frame of a gif image.

item.title: D - Design a video player
item.description: 业务最开始实现的视频播放功能用的是 xgplayer 插件，这个插件比较重，更侧重于直播。而我们业务所需要的仅仅是一个美化版本的 <video>，为此，我们需要基于 video api 实现自己的播放器。
